# Visual Studio Project

## Create a *.Net Framework* Project


![Selection_999(1450).png](_resources/6c8b17f744b24a0a8cbb974fb6a78e11.png)

## Add all the generated files

![Selection_999(1463).png](_resources/106ca3b6a0f741a085f88c24f18d69fd.png)




![Selection_999(1452).png](_resources/2e8a673484da4314bcb9e80b865aa969.png)


## (Optional) Create two build configuration to handle x86 and x86-64


### Go on `Build` --> `Configuration Manager`


![Selection_999(1504).png](_resources/682dd86b801047e99986f5c225d65240.png)



### Open the drop down menu `Active solution platform` and click on `New`



![Selection_999(1505).png](_resources/a8db5253cba444968862ad5a6917e44f.png)

### Create the configuration

![Selection_999(1506).png](_resources/746f954e160c46cb8c372b7a73cf7e18.png)



## Enable unsafe code


Pick `Allow unsafe code` in the project `Build` configuration



![Selection_999(1501).png](_resources/20b17c27ee3046419006a05afa483239.png)



## Define conditional compilation symbol (only 64 bit)


![Selection_999(1503).png](_resources/0d74d97edaae4a7b87ac5f8cf4297abc.png)
